block.p: PARDO-John. Of Staten Island on October 11, 2000. Nephew of Flora & Amalia Sanchez. Loving cousin of Antonio and Reina Suarez and Joseph and Gloria Vales. Funeral from Casey Funeral Home, 350 Slosson Avenue, Staten Island, New York, Saturday. Mass of Christian Burial St. Teresa's Church 9:30 A.M. Interment in Holmdel Cemetery, NJ. Friends will be received Thursday 7-9 P.M. and Friday 2-4 and 7-9 P.M.
